name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Value Engineer, I leverage strong analytical skills and strategic thinking to deliver value-driven solutions in the technology sector. My background in full-stack development with expertise in **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, **Django**, **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** enables me to understand and communicate complex technical concepts effectively. With 8 years of experience, I have a proven track record of engaging in value-based selling and consulting, ensuring that client needs are met through high-performance solutions.

I have successfully managed projects in the healthcare and financial sectors, guiding teams through the intricacies of SaaS applications and business analysis. My extensive experience in cloud services, particularly **Azure** and **AWS**, complements my project management skills and enhances collaboration with stakeholders. I am adept at analyzing requirements and aligning technology strategies with business objectives to increase efficiency and drive growth.
